channel.title: Notes on Akash Goswami
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Akash Goswami

item.title: Use an adblocker
item.description: You should be using an adblocker. Not because ads are bad (although some are really annoying), but because even the FBI recommend using one for security now. Use uBlock Origin and block those scam adverts that pop up at the top of search results.
